
     .corona{background:#ce0058;color:#fff;display:-webkit-box;display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;font-size:23px;font-size:1.4375rem;line-height:28px;line-height:1.75rem;font-family:Stag,trebuchet,serif;padding:20px 0;position:relative;width:100%;z-index:100}@media (max-width:800px){.corona{font-size:20px;font-size:1.25rem;line-height:25px;line-height:1.5625rem;padding:15px 20px}}@media (max-width:450px){.corona{font-size:16px;font-size:1rem;line-height:21px;line-height:1.3125rem}}.corona+header.floating-menu{top:66px}@media (max-width:800px){.corona+header.floating-menu{top:50px}}@media (max-width:305px){.corona+header.floating-menu{top:70px}}.corona+header.floating-menu.on{top:0;z-index:101}.corona a{color:#fff;font-weight:700;text-decoration:none}.corona a:hover{text-decoration:underline}.corona button{background:0 0;border:none;color:transparent;cursor:pointer;font-size:20px;font-size:1.25rem;line-height:25px;line-height:1.5625rem;height:25px;position:absolute;top:50%;-webkit-transform:translateY(-50%);transform:translateY(-50%);right:0;width:25px}@media (min-width:801px) and (max-width:1280px){.corona button{right:20px}}.corona button:after,.corona button:before{background-color:#fff;content:" ";height:24px;position:absolute;top:0;-webkit-transition:all .3s ease-in-out;transition:all .3s ease-in-out;width:4px}@media (max-width:670px){.corona button:after,.corona button:before{height:25px;width:3px}}.corona button:before{-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);transform:rotate(45deg)}.corona button:after{-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);transform:rotate(-45deg)}.corona button:hover:after,.corona button:hover:before{-webkit-transform:rotate(270deg);transform:rotate(270deg)}.corona strong{font-weight:700!important;letter-spacing:.04em}.container{margin:0 auto;max-width:1240px;padding-left:20px;padding-right:20px;position:relative;width:100%}@media (max-width:600px){.container{padding:0}}.container>div{width:calc(100% - 40px)}
